title: Dissapointment.
body:
After struggling from bronze 1 to silver 2 my placements were good. I was 7/2.... smiling happy ready for a new season. Thought I was actually getting somewhere, some great games! My final placement match. We dominated them, 8/2 was there. The team surrendered for the ultimate troll. 7/3. Season 2 to Season 6 of being a wood/silver player.
The End. I don't honestly think I can bring myself to come back into this community or play league again.

P.S. I got placed back into Silver V.

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
